official-title.#text:
To amend part C of the Balanced Budget and Emergency
		  Deficit Control Act of 1985 to include the pay of Members of Congress within
		  the coverage of the provisions of such Act which provide for budget enforcement
		  through sequestration.

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the following
			 bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text:
Member of Congress Pay Sequestration
			 and Fairness Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Inclusion of member
			 pay among accounts subject to budget enforcement through sequestration

quote.#text:
, and such term
			 includes any item for the pay of Senators or Representatives in, or Delegates
			 or the Resident Commissioner to, the Congress

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is
			 amended by inserting before the period the following:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Paragraph (11) of section 250(c) of the
			 Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985/s:250/ss:c/p:11

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall apply with respect to any sequestration occurring under
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Member of Congress Pay Sequestration and Fairness Act/s:2/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
during
			 the One Hundred Fourteenth Congress or any succeeding Congress.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: part C of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985/pt:C
